application.doc: Listing trace files for a particular component

param.name: component_id
param.doc: ID of the tracing component to be updated. This value should be URL encoded.

param.name: id
param.doc: Name of the instance to act on, which is a unique name that identifies the instance

method.name: GET
method.id: List Trace Files - Reverse Proxy Server
method.doc: To complete this operation with the web service, issue an HTTP GET command on the Reverse Proxy tracing files resource URI.

param.name: Accept:application/json
param.doc: Required for requests to the service

representation.name: listTraceFilesRvsProxyJsonResponse
representation.doc: Note: Response body is an array.

param.name: file_size
param.doc: The current accumulated size of the trace file and all rollover trace files for this component

param.name: version
param.doc: The current version of file. This is the last modified time of the file. A numerical number that indicates the number of seconds since the Epoch (00:00:00 UTC, January 1, 1970).

response.doc: There is a problem with the request. The JSON message describes the problem.
File not Found, The requested service does not exist. The JSON message indicates which resource.
An internal error occurred. The JSON message indicates the problem.
